description.Description: the description of the metric alert that will be included in the alert email.

enabled.Description: the flag that indicates whether the metric alert is enabled.

scopes.Description: the list of resource id's that this metric alert is scoped to.

evaluationFrequency.Description: how often the metric alert is evaluated represented in ISO 8601 duration format.

windowSize.Description: the period of time (in ISO 8601 duration format) that is used to monitor alert activity based on the threshold.

targetResourceType.Description: the resource type of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Mandatory if the scope contains a subscription, resource group, or more than one resource.

targetResourceRegion.Description: the region of the target resource(s) on which the alert is created/updated. Mandatory if the scope contains a subscription, resource group, or more than one resource.

criteria.Description: The rule criteria that defines the conditions of the alert rule.

autoMitigate.Description: the flag that indicates whether the alert should be auto resolved or not. The default is true.

actions.Description: the array of actions that are performed when the alert rule becomes active, and when an alert condition is resolved.

lastUpdatedTime.Description: Last time the rule was updated in ISO8601 format.

isMigrated.Description: the value indicating whether this alert rule is migrated.

allOf.Description: The list of metric criteria for this 'all of' operation.

odata.type.Description: Specifies the metric alert criteria for a single resource that has multiple metric criteria.

skipMetricValidation.Description: Allows creating an alert rule on a custom metric that isn't yet emitted, by causing the metric validation to be skipped.

threshold.Description: the criteria threshold value that activates the alert.

operator.Description: the dimension operator. Only 'Include' and 'Exclude' are supported

webTestId.Description: The Application Insights web test Id.

odata.type.Description: Specifies the metric alert rule criteria for a web test resource.

allOf.Description: the list of multiple metric criteria for this 'all of' operation.

odata.type.Description: Specifies the metric alert criteria for multiple resource that has multiple metric criteria.

skipMetricValidation.Description: Allows creating an alert rule on a custom metric that isn't yet emitted, by causing the metric validation to be skipped.

operator.Description: The operator used to compare the metric value against the threshold.

alertSensitivity.Description: The extent of deviation required to trigger an alert. This will affect how tight the threshold is to the metric series pattern.

failingPeriods.Description: The minimum number of violations required within the selected lookback time window required to raise an alert.

ignoreDataBefore.Description: Use this option to set the date from which to start learning the metric historical data and calculate the dynamic thresholds (in ISO8601 format)

numberOfEvaluationPeriods.Description: The number of aggregated lookback points. The lookback time window is calculated based on the aggregation granularity (windowSize) and the selected number of aggregated points.

minFailingPeriodsToAlert.Description: The number of violations to trigger an alert. Should be smaller or equal to numberOfEvaluationPeriods.

actionGroupId.Description: the id of the action group to use.

webHookProperties.Description: This field allows specifying custom properties, which would be appended to the alert payload sent as input to the webhook.
